lead_paragraph: The Nets have signed their first-round draft pick, Sean Williams, the team said yesterday.Williams, a 6-10, 235-pound forward from Boston College, was the 17th pick in this year’s draft.As the 17th pick, Williams will earn $1,180,500 his rookie year and $1,269,100 his second year. The Nets have options for the third and fourth years.
